hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'rm[[:space:]]+-rf[[:space:]]+(/|\.)'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Dangerous rm -rf on root or current directory' && exit 2; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git[[:space:]]+push.*--force.*(main|master)'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Force push to protected branch' && exit 2; fi

for file in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do if echo "$file" | grep -qE '_linux\.go$'; then echo "WARNING: Editing Linux-specific file: $file"; echo "Consider if *_other.go needs corresponding changes"; fi; done
for file in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do if echo "$file" | grep -qE '\.go$'; then gofmt -w "$file" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; done
